author: Adam Savage’s Tested
description:
Jesse Velez, practical FX designer and shop owner at Raptor House FX, returns to the cave with a completely redesigned version of his animatronic robot made for the promotion of Netflix's Wednesday show! This iteration of the iconic Addams Family character has a whole new set of capabilities, including remote puppeted control using a motion tracked glove!

Raptor House: https://www.raptorhousefx.com/
Follow Jesse on Instagram at: https://www.instagram.com/raptorhousefx/ and  https://www.instagram.com/jessemvelez
MANUS Metagloves (Control Gloves): https://www.manus-meta.com/ and https://www.instagram.com/manusmeta/
Alt Bionics Prosthetic Hand: https://www.altbionics.com/ and https://www.instagram.com/altbionics
Animatronic "Thing" From Netflix's Wednesday: https://youtu.be/w3cvE8jtxuw

Subscribe for more videos (and click the bell for notifications):  http://www.youtube.com/subscription_center?add_user=testedcom

title: Adam Savage Reacts to Animatronic "Thing" From Wednesday!
